notifyAlreadyExists: This e-mail address is already registered. Please use the login tab or use another e-mail address to sign up.
notifyInvalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
notifyTooManyRequests: Access to this account has been temporarily disabled due to many failed login attempts. Please try again later.
notifyUserDisabled: The user corresponding to the given email has been disabled
notifyUserNotFound: There is no user corresponding to the given email
notifyWeakPassword: The password chosen is too weak.
notifyWrongPassword: The password is wrong. Please try again.
